description:
Gothita, known as the Fixation Pokémon, is a human-like baby Pokémon with purple skin, and black and white clothes. It has three bows, and a small tuft of hair. Their bows increase their psychic abilities. Gothita closely observe both Trainers and Pokémon, looking at something that only they can see.
They are a version exclusive Pokémon and are only obtainable in Pokémon Black version.
name: Gothimu
